00048 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00049 /* USB Device descriptor setting                                                                            */
00050 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00051 // <h> USB Device descriptor setting
00052 //   <o0> USB Specification Release number (bcdUSB)
00053 //      <0x0200=> USB 2.0
00054 //      <0x0110=> USB 1.1
00055 //      <0x0100=> USB 1.0
00056 //   <o1> USB Class code (assigned by the USB-IF)
00057 //      <0x00=> Use class information in the Interface Descriptors (0x00)
00058 //      <0x02=> Communications and CDC Control (CDC, 0x02)
00059 //      <0xDC=> Diagnostic Device (0xDC)
00060 //      <0xEF=> Miscellaneous (0xEF)
00061 //      <0xFF=> Vendor Specific (0xFF)
00062 //   <o2> USB Subclass code (assigned by the USB-IF) <0x0-0xFF:1>
00063 //   <o3> USB Protocol code (assigned by the USB-IF) <0x0-0xFF:1>
00064 //   <o4> USB Vendor ID <0x0-0xFFFF:1>
00065 //   <o5> USB Product ID <0x0-0xFFFF:1>
00066 //   <o6> USB Device Version <0x0-0xFFFF:1>
00067 //   <o7.0> USB String descriptor - Manufacturer
00068 //   <o8.0> USB String descriptor - Product
00069 //   <o9.0> USB String descriptor - Device serial number
00070 //   <o10> USB Number of possible configurations <0-255:1>
00071 #define DESC_BCDUSB               (0x0110)
00072 #define DESC_BDEVCLASS            (0x00)
00073 #define DESC_BDEVSUBCLASS         (0x00)
00074 #define DESC_BDEVPROTOCOL         (0x00)
00075 #define DESC_IDVENDOR             (0x04D9)
00076 #define DESC_IDPRODUCT            (0x8008)
00077 #define DESC_BCDDEVICE            (0x0100)
00078 #define DESC_IMANUFACTURE         (1)
00079 #define DESC_IPRODUCT             (1)
00080 #define DESC_ISERIALNUM           (1)
00081 #define DESC_INUMCONFN            (1)
00082 // </h>
00083 
00084 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00085 /* USB Device Descriptor definition. DO NOT MODIFY.                                                         */
00086 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00087 #if (DESC_BDEVCLASS == 0x0 & DESC_BDEVSUBCLASS != 0x0)
00088 #error "DESC_BDEVSUBCLASS must be reset to zero when the DESC_BDEVCLASS is equal to zero."
00089 #endif
00090 #define DESC_WMAXPACKETSIZE0      (_EP0LEN)
00091 #define DESC_STR_MAN              (1 * DESC_IMANUFACTURE)
00092 #define DESC_STR_PRD              (2 * DESC_IPRODUCT)
00093 #define DESC_STR_SER              (3 * DESC_ISERIALNUM)
00094 #define DESC_NUM_STRING           (1 + 3)
00095 
00096 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00097 /* USB Device descriptor                                                                                    */
00098 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00099 __ALIGN4 static uc8 guUSB_DeviceDesc[] =
00100 {
00101   /*--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00102   /* Device descriptor                                                                                      */
00103   /*--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00104                               /* Field            Size Description                                          */
00105                               /*----------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00106   DESC_LEN_DEV,               // bLength             1 Size of this descriptor in bytes
00107   DESC_TYPE_01_DEV,           // bDescriptorType     1 DEVICE Descriptor Type
00108   DESC_H2B(DESC_BCDUSB),      // bcdUSB              2 USB Specification Release Number
00109   DESC_BDEVCLASS,             // bDeviceClass        1 Class code (assigned by the USB-IF)
00110   DESC_BDEVSUBCLASS,          // bDeviceSubClass     1 Subclass code (assigned by the USB-IF)
00111   DESC_BDEVPROTOCOL,          // bDeviceProtocol     1 Protocol code (assigned by the USB-IF)
00112   DESC_WMAXPACKETSIZE0,       // wMaxPacketSize0     1 Maximum packet size for endpoint zero
00113   DESC_H2B(DESC_IDVENDOR),    // idVendor            2 Vendor ID (assigned by USB-IF)
00114   DESC_H2B(DESC_IDPRODUCT),   // idProduct           2 Product ID (assigned by manufacturer)
00115   DESC_H2B(DESC_BCDDEVICE),   // bcdDevice           2 Device release number
00116   DESC_STR_MAN,               // iManufacturer       1 Index of string descriptor (Manufacturer)
00117   DESC_STR_PRD,               // iProduct            1 Index of string descriptor (Product)
00118   DESC_STR_SER,               // iSerialNumber       1 Index of string descriptor (Serial Number)
00119   DESC_INUMCONFN,             // iNumConfigurations  1 Number of possible configuration
00120 };
00121 
00122 
00123 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00124 /* USB Configuration descriptor setting                                                                     */
00125 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00126 // <h> USB Configuration descriptor setting
00127 //   <o0.0> Self-powered
00128 //     <i> Bit 6 of bmAttributes
00129 //   <o1.0> Remote Wakeup
00130 //     <i> Bit 5 of bmAttributes
00131 //   <o2> USB Device maximum power (mA) < 2-512:2>
00132 #define DESC_BMATTR_SELF_POWER        (0)
00133 #define DESC_BMATTR_REMOTE_WAKEUP     (1)
00134 #define DESC_BMAXPOWER                (100)
00135 // </h>
00136 
00137 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00138 /* USB Configuration Descriptor definition. DO NOT MODIFY.                                                  */
00139 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00140 #define DESC_BMATTRIBUTES        (0x80 | (DESC_BMATTR_SELF_POWER << 6) | (DESC_BMATTR_REMOTE_WAKEUP << 5))
00141 #define DESC_TOTAL_LEN           DESC_H2B((DESC_LEN_CONFN_T + RETARGET_DLEN))
00142 
00143 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00144 /* USB Configuration Descriptor                                                                             */
00145 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00146 __ALIGN4 static uc8 guUSB_ConfnDesc[] =
00147 {
00148   /*--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00149   /* Configuration descriptor                                                                               */
00150   /*--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00151                               /* Field            Size Description                                          */
00152                               /*----------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00153   DESC_LEN_CONFN,             // bLength             1 Size of this descriptor in bytes
00154   DESC_TYPE_02_CONFN,         // bDescriptorType     1 CONFIGURATION Descriptor Type
00155   DESC_TOTAL_LEN,             // wTotalLength        2 Total length of data returned for this configuration
00156   0x02 + RETARGET_INF,        // bNumberInterface    1 Number of interfaces supported by this configuration
00157   0x01,                       // bConfigurationValue 1 Value to use as an argument to the SetConfiguration()
00158   0x00,                       // iConfiguration      1 Index of string descriptor describing this configuration
00159   DESC_BMATTRIBUTES,          // bmAttributes        1 Configuration characteristics
00160                               //                        D6: Self-powered, D5: RemoteWakeup
00161   DESC_POWER(DESC_BMAXPOWER), // bMaxPower           1 Maximum power consumption of the USB device (2 mA units)
00162 
00163   /*--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00164   /* Interface descriptor                                                                                   */
00165   /*--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00166                               /* Field            Size Description                                          */
00167                               /*----------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00168   DESC_LEN_INF,               // bLength             1 Size of this descriptor in bytes
00169   DESC_TYPE_04_INF,           // bDescriptorType     1 INTERFACE Descriptor Type
00170   0x00,                       // bInterfaceNumber    1 Number of this interface (Zero-based 0)
00171   0x00,                       // bAlternateSetting   1 Value used to select this alternate setting
00172   1,                          // bNumEndpoints       1 Number of endpoints used by this interface
00173   CLASS_INF0_CLASS,           // bInterfaceClass     1 Class code (assigned by USB-IF)
00174   CLASS_INF0_SUBCLASS,        // bInterfaceSubClass  1 Subclass code (assigned by USB-IF)
00175   CLASS_INF0_PTCO,            // bInterfaceProtocol  1 Protocol code (assigned by USB)
00176   0x00,                       // iInterface          1 Index of string descriptor describing this interface
00177 
00178   /*--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00179   /* HID descriptor                                                                                         */
00180   /*--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00181                               /* Field            Size Description                                          */
00182                               /*----------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00183   DESC_LEN_HID,               // bLength             1 Size of this descriptor in bytes
00184   DESC_TYPE_21_HID,           // bDescriptorType     1 HID Descriptor type
00185   DESC_H2B(0x0110),           // bcdHID              2 HID Specification Release Number
00186   0x21,                       // bCountryCode        1 Country code of the localized hardware
00187   0x01,                       // bNumDescriptors     1 Number of class descriptors (at least 1)
00188   DESC_TYPE_22_RPOT,          // bDescriptorType     1 REPORT Descriptor Type
00189   DESC_H2B(DESC_LEN_RPOT),    // bDescriptorLength   2 Total size of the Report descriptor
00190 
00191   /*--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00192   /* Endpoint                                                                                               */
00193   /*--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00194                               /* Field            Size Description                                          */
00195                               /*----------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00196   DESC_LEN_EPT,               // bLength             1 Size of this descriptor in bytes
00197   DESC_TYPE_05_EPT,           // bDescriptorType     1 ENDPOINT Descriptor Type
00198   0x81,                       // bEndpointAddress    1 The address of the endpoint
00199                               //                        Bit 3..0: The endpoint number
00200                               //                        Bit 6..4: Reserved
00201                               //                        Bit 7   : Direction (0 = Out/1 = In)
00202   0x03,                       // bmAttribute         1 Endpoint Attribute
00203                               //                        Bit 1..0: Transfer type
00204                               //                                  00 = Control
00205                               //                                  01 = Isochronous
00206                               //                                  10 = Bulk
00207                               //                                  11 = Interrupt
00208                               //                        All other reserved
00209   DESC_H2B(_EP1LEN),          // wMaxPacketSize      2 Maximum packet size
00210   0x01,                       // bInterval           1 Interval for polling endpoint
00211 
00212   /*--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00213   /* Interface descriptor                                                                                   */
00214   /*--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00215                               /* Field            Size Description                                          */
00216                               /*----------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00217   DESC_LEN_INF,               // bLength             1 Size of this descriptor in bytes
00218   DESC_TYPE_04_INF,           // bDescriptorType     1 INTERFACE Descriptor Type
00219   0x01,                       // bInterfaceNumber    1 Number of this interface (Zero-based 0)
00220   0x00,                       // bAlternateSetting   1 Value used to select this alternate setting
00221   2,                          // bNumEndpoints       1 Number of endpoints used by this interface
00222   CLASS_INF1_CLASS,           // bInterfaceClass     1 Class code (assigned by USB-IF)
00223   CLASS_INF1_SUBCLASS,        // bInterfaceSubClass  1 Subclass code (assigned by USB-IF)
00224   CLASS_INF1_PTCO,            // bInterfaceProtocol  1 Protocol code (assigned by USB)
00225   0x00,                       // iInterface          1 Index of string descriptor describing this interface
00226 
00227   /*--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00228   /* Endpoint                                                                                               */
00229   /*--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00230                               /* Field            Size Description                                          */
00231                               /*----------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00232   DESC_LEN_EPT,               // bLength             1 Size of this descriptor in bytes
00233   DESC_TYPE_05_EPT,           // bDescriptorType     1 ENDPOINT Descriptor Type
00234   0x82,                       // bEndpointAddress    1 The address of the endpoint
00235                               //                        Bit 3..0: The endpoint number
00236                               //                        Bit 6..4: Reserved
00237                               //                        Bit 7   : Direction (0 = Out/1 = In)
00238   0x02,                       // bmAttribute         1 Endpoint Attribute
00239                               //                        Bit 1..0: Transfer type
00240                               //                                  00 = Control
00241                               //                                  01 = Isochronous
00242                               //                                  10 = Bulk
00243                               //                                  11 = Interrupt
00244                               //                        All other reserved
00245   DESC_H2B(_EP2LEN),          // wMaxPacketSize      2 Maximum packet size
00246   0x00,                       // bInterval           1 Interval for polling endpoint
00247 
00248   /*--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00249   /* Endpoint                                                                                               */
00250   /*--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00251                               /* Field            Size Description                                          */
00252                               /*----------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00253   DESC_LEN_EPT,               // bLength             1 Size of this descriptor in bytes
00254   DESC_TYPE_05_EPT,           // bDescriptorType     1 ENDPOINT Descriptor Type
00255   0x03,                       // bEndpointAddress    1 The address of the endpoint
00256                               //                        Bit 3..0: The endpoint number
00257                               //                        Bit 6..4: Reserved
00258                               //                        Bit 7   : Direction (0 = Out/1 = In)
00259   0x02,                       // bmAttribute         1 Endpoint Attribute
00260                               //                        Bit 1..0: Transfer type
00261                               //                                  00 = Control
00262                               //                                  01 = Isochronous
00263                               //                                  10 = Bulk
00264                               //                                  11 = Interrupt
00265                               //                        All other reserved
00266   DESC_H2B(_EP3LEN),          // wMaxPacketSize      2 Maximum packet size
00267   0x00,                       // bInterval           1 Interval for polling endpoint
00268 
00269   #ifdef RETARGET_IS_USB
00270     #include "ht32_retarget_desc.h"
00271   #endif
00272 
00273 };
00274 
00275 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00276 /* USB String Descriptor                                                                                    */
00277 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00278 __ALIGN4 static uc8 guUSB_StringDescLANGID[] =
00279 {
00280   /*--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00281   /* LANGID (Index = 0)                                                                                     */
00282   /*--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00283                               /* Field            Size Description                                          */
00284                               /*----------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00285   DESC_STRLEN(1),             // bLength             1 Size of this descriptor in bytes
00286   DESC_TYPE_03_STR,           // bDescriptorType     1 STRING Descriptor Type
00287   DESC_H2B(0x0409),           // wLANGID[0]          2 LANGID code zero
00288 };
00289 
00290 #if (DESC_IMANUFACTURE == 1)
00291 __ALIGN4 static uc8 guUSB_StringDescManufacture[] =
00292 {
00293   /*--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00294   /* Manufacture (Index = 1)                                                                                */
00295   /*--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00296                               /* Field            Size Description                                          */
00297                               /*----------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00298   DESC_STRLEN(6),             // bLength             1 Size of this descriptor in bytes
00299   DESC_TYPE_03_STR,           // bDescriptorType     1 STRING Descriptor Type
00300   DESC_CHAR('H'),             // bString             N UNICODE encoded string
00301   DESC_CHAR('O'),
00302   DESC_CHAR('L'),
00303   DESC_CHAR('T'),
00304   DESC_CHAR('E'),
00305   DESC_CHAR('K'),
00306 };
00307 #endif
00308 
00309 #if (DESC_IPRODUCT == 1)
00310 __ALIGN4 static uc8 guUSB_StringDescProduct[] =
00311 {
00312   /*--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00313   /* Product (Index = 2)                                                                                    */
00314   /*--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00315                               /* Field            Size Description                                          */
00316                               /*----------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00317   DESC_STRLEN(11),            // bLength             1 Size of this descriptor in bytes
00318   DESC_TYPE_03_STR,           // bDescriptorType     1 STRING Descriptor Type
00319   DESC_CHAR('U'),             // bString             N UNICODE encoded string
00320   DESC_CHAR('S'),
00321   DESC_CHAR('B'),
00322   DESC_CHAR('-'),
00323   DESC_CHAR('H'),
00324   DESC_CHAR('I'),
00325   DESC_CHAR('D'),
00326   DESC_CHAR('/'),
00327   DESC_CHAR('M'),
00328   DESC_CHAR('S'),
00329   DESC_CHAR('C'),
00330 };
00331 #endif
00332 
00333 
00334 #if (DESC_ISERIALNUM == 1)
00335 __ALIGN4 static u8 guUSB_StringDescSerialNum[] =
00336 {
00337   /*--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00338   /* Serial Number (Index = 3)                                                                              */
00339   /*--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00340                               /* Field            Size Description                                          */
00341                               /*----------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00342   DESC_STRLEN(12),            // bLength             1 Size of this descriptor in bytes
00343   DESC_TYPE_03_STR,           // bDescriptorType     1 STRING Descriptor Type
00344   DESC_CHAR('0'),             // bString             N UNICODE encoded string
00345   DESC_CHAR('0'),
00346   DESC_CHAR('0'),
00347   DESC_CHAR('0'),
00348   DESC_CHAR('0'),
00349   DESC_CHAR('0'),
00350   DESC_CHAR('0'),
00351   DESC_CHAR('0'),
00352   DESC_CHAR('0'),
00353   DESC_CHAR('0'),
00354   DESC_CHAR('0'),
00355   DESC_CHAR('8'),
00356 };
00357 #endif
00358 
00359 uc8 *gpStringDesc[DESC_NUM_STRING] =
00360 {
00361 
00362   guUSB_StringDescLANGID,
00363 
00364   #if (DESC_IMANUFACTURE == 1)
00365   guUSB_StringDescManufacture,
00366   #else
00367   NULL,
00368   #endif
00369 
00370   #if (DESC_IPRODUCT == 1)
00371   guUSB_StringDescProduct,
00372   #else
00373   NULL,
00374   #endif
00375 
00376   #if (DESC_ISERIALNUM == 1)
00377   guUSB_StringDescSerialNum
00378   #else
00379   NULL,
00380   #endif
00381 
00382 };
00383 
00384 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00385   * @brief  USB Descriptor pointer initialization.
00386   * @param  pDesc: pointer of USBDCore_Desc_TypeDef
00387   * @retval None
00388   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00389 void USBDDesc_Init(USBDCore_Desc_TypeDef *pDesc)
00390 {
00391   pDesc->pDeviceDesc = guUSB_DeviceDesc;
00392   pDesc->pConfnDesc = guUSB_ConfnDesc;
00393   pDesc->ppStringDesc = gpStringDesc;
00394   pDesc->uStringDescNumber = DESC_NUM_STRING;
00395 
00396   return;
00397 }
